sentences.en: " Keep my three camels, sir , and take the whole lot outside the pass to graze. "
sentences.cn: “ 老者,留下我的三匹, 凑成一把儿到口外去 放青.
一颗子弹擦过他的手臂。

sentences.en: An expanse of land suitable for livestock to wander and graze on.
sentences.cn: 可以饲养牲畜的宽广开阔的地区.

sentences.en: fields where they used to graze their sheep
Five cows graze serenely around a massive oak.
sentences.cn: 5头奶牛在一棵大橡树旁悠闲自在地啃着青草。

sentences.en: His knee stung from the graze.
sentences.cn: 他的膝盖擦伤后十分疼痛.

sentences.en: I fell on the gravel, severely grazing my knee.
sentences.cn: 我摔倒在砾石路上，膝盖擦伤得很严重。

sentences.en: In France it is apparently illegal to graze livestock in woodland.
sentences.cn: 在法国,在林地放牧牲畜显然是违法的.

sentences.en: In that day your cattle will graze in broad meadows.
sentences.cn: 到那时你的牲畜,必在宽阔的草场吃草.
没关系, 就破了一点皮.

sentences.en: On Sundays he had earned the right to graze in the pasture and rest.
sentences.cn: 到星期天,它就有权在牧场上啃头草根休息休息了.

sentences.en: The sheep usually graze in the grass land.
There is good grassland here for your cattle and horses to graze on.
sentences.cn: 这里有很好的草地供你们放牧牛马.

sentences.en: We graze cattle on our fields.
We used to graze on the fields where the com is now.
sentences.cn: 过去我们经常在现在种着粮食的田里放牧.
我们将把一块地做牧地.

sentences.en: With their fleece sopping wet, they huddled in hollows, too dispirited to graze.
sentences.cn: 在皮毛打湿的情况下, 他们挤在低洼处,靠近黑莓丛,或者躲在背风坡上, 毫无觅食的情绪.

sentences.en: You may graze the ground, when the trees are grown up.
sentences.cn: 树木长大之后,你就可以在这地里放牧了.

words.tran_cn: 放牧人；畜牧业者；牧场主
擦过；放牧（graze的过去分词）；抓破

trans.tran_en: a wound caused by rubbing that slightly breaks the surface of your skin
if an animal grazes, or if you graze it, it eats grass that is growing
if an animal grazes, or if you graze it, it eats grass that is growing
to accidentally break the surface of your skin by rubbing it against something
